pr_title: Add mappings related to FOV/Distortion Effect options

timeline.message: Add mappings related to FOV/Distortion Effect options

timeline.author: haykam821

replies.bodyText: This would be inconsistent with other names like "VIGNETTE_TEXTURE" and "PUMPKIN_BLUR", which are IDs too and are used for similar purposes
replies.author: joaoh1
